item.title: India Shelter Finance Corporation Forms Death Cross, Signalling Potential Bearish Trend
item.description: India Shelter Finance Corporation, a key player in the housing finance sector, has recently formed a Death Cross, a technical pattern where the 50-day moving average crosses below the 200-day moving average. This development often signals a shift towards a bearish trend and suggests a potential weakening in the stock’s medium to long-term momentum. Time: 5 hours ago

item.title: Creative Newtech Forms Golden Cross, Signalling Potential Bullish Breakout
item.description: Creative Newtech has recently experienced a significant technical event known as the Golden Cross, where its 50-day moving average has crossed above the 200-day moving average. This development is widely regarded as a bullish signal, indicating a possible shift in long-term momentum and a potential trend reversal for the stock. Time: 5 hours ago
